com.cs301w01.meatload.authentication.querygenerator

Class UserQueryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.model.querygenerators.QueryGenerator
      • com.cs301w01.meatload.authentication.querygenerator.UserQueryGenerator

  • public class UserQueryGenerator
extends QueryGenerator
    Handles all queries relating to the user systems including subscription, login, sign up, and any other functionality related to users.
    Author:
    Derek Dowling
